sentences.en: A snail by comparison is supersonic.

sentences.en: Dear me, can't you walk quicker? A snail by comparison is supersonic.

sentences.en: Supersonic flight could become a routine form of travel in the 21st century.

sentences.en: The strength of negative temperature concrete is tested with supersonic - rebounding method.

sentences.en: The superstitious man put the priority on the superficial supersonic superiority.
